name: Tactician's Spear
effect: When you deal damage with a weapon in the slot this weapon occupies, until your next turn, you increase your threat by 1 and you can make an additional overwatch attack with that weapon in the round. This effect persists from when this weapon is mounted on a mech weapon mount till this weapon is removed from the weapon mount

name: Hyper-Dense Trident
effect: When you attack with this weapon in Low Gravity or Zero Gravity this weapon’s damage changes to 1d6 Kinetic and gains the Accurate tag.

id: MtOlympInc-Pos Class II Hippokampos Atmospheric Disruptor
name: Class II Hippokampos Atmospheric Disruptor
effect:
After this Weapon does damage for the next two rounds at the start of your turn it deals it’s damage again in its area to all hostile targets.
Any mech dealt damage by this weapon must make a Hull check or be Slowed for 2 rounds afterwards.

name: Vulcan Class Hammer
effect: This weapon can be used to attack a friendly target. If targeting a friendly target it gains +2 Accuracy for the attack and deals no damage; instead you may spend a Repair to heal the target half of their total HP.

name: Zeus Pattern Lightning Cannon
effect: As a free action at the start of your turn you can reconfigure this weapon to target a friendly target. In this mode it does no energy damage (but still heat damage), but instead supercharges all mechs in the blast area until the end of your next turn . When supercharged a mech deals +1d6 damage, scores critical hits on a total of 18 on an attack roll (rather than 20), gains +5 to their sensor range, and gains a +2 to tech attacks against targets within half of their (new) sensor range.

name: Eclipse Class Lazer
effect: This weapon does no damage, but instead it completely blinds the target for a round. If the attack crits it blinds the target for two rounds. This weapon cannot be used to target swarms. If used to target squads it deals 1 energy damage instead.
